name: amplify
title: Amplify
desc: An electric landing page and SaaS template with sleek animations and glow effects. Includes full i18n capabilities, Keystatic CMS, a blog with categories, and more. Built with Astro v5 and Tailwind CSS v4.
article:
Save weeks of time and get a SaaS landing page and blog running in a snap.

Amplify is the perfect way to introduce your new idea to the world. It features a sleek modern design, tons of sections, and a built in block to engage potential customers. Build with Astro v5 and Tailwind CSS v4, and integrated with Keystatic CMS for easy content editing.

With tons of features to make your life easy:

  • Full Internationalization (i18n) capabilities with tons of utility functions, examples, and components
  • Keystatic CMS integration for blog posts, authors, and other pages, with a great interface and rich text editor
  • Easy-to-use, with data and config files for important items on the website. You donât have to go digging through thousands of lines of code to change the site title.
  • Over 100 unique components. Including 3 hero sections, 9 feature sections, 4 pricing sections, 4 CTAs, 3 testimonial sections, 2 faq sections, 2 logo clouds, 404, contact, legal, 2 blog post layouts, and a cookie banner.
  • Built-in image optimization with Astro.
  • Built-in MDX blog with markdown frontmatter validation, and multiple author support.
  • Scroll-based animations that are easily customizable, or can be disabled with a one-line config change.
  • Boring SEO stuff like OG tags, Twitter cards, and other metadata - already taken care of.
  • View transitions enabled, with a one-line config change to disable.
  • Responsive - itâs 2024, of course itâs responsive!

Keystatic CMS

Keystatic is included in this theme, allowing non-technical editors to easily edit blog posts, authors, and other pages. It is a local / git based CMS so all content still lives in your repo. Donât want to use it? You donât have to! You can easily just write in the MDX pages as normal.
